description: This file declares the IOttServices interface for the OttServices plugin, exposed via COMRPC. It defines the interface for invoking OttServices functionality including permission management, token retrieval, and a ping method.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface for OttServices plugin functionality, supporting permission queries, token retrieval, and ping operations.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Pings the service and obtains a reply string, echoing the input message.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a given application ID as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for the specified application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Fetches permissions from remote service and updates the cache for specified application ID.

methods.name: GetDistributorToken
methods.description: Retrieves a distributor token for the specified application ID, internally fetching xACT and SAT via Thunder.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves an authentication token for the specified application ID from Thunder.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
